body_text: Yeah, we don't have any tools set up to test actions against the actual add-on, unfortunately. That also means that change 3 is a bit out of reach. I think it would make sense to make this API a little less sensitive, and enforce the things we actually care about (like length limits and a normandy-prefix). I'll work on that.
